mapper.select: select id, name, imgsrc, price from fooddelivered.product;
mapper.update: update fooddelivered.product set product.name = #{name}, product.imgsrc = #{imgsrc}, product.price = #{price}, product.briefinfo = #{briefinfo}, product.fullinfo = #{fullinfo} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into fooddelivered.product(name, imgsrc, price, briefinfo, fullinfo) values (#{name}, #{imgsrc}, #{price}, #{briefinfo}, #{fullinfo});
